articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Putin
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Putin 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Russian President V. Putin on Feb. 16.
 The message said:    
 Please accept my sincere congratulations to you on your birthday.
 Russia knows well about the role you have played for the development of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperative relations between our two countries.
 I am sure that the traditional friendly and many-sided ties between Russia and the DPRK will continue to expand in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too, and contribute to ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region, on the solid basis of the treaty concluded on Feb. 9, 2000.
 I wish you good health and success in your work and the Korean people happiness and prosperity.

People's Security Servicepersons' Meeting and Dancing Party Held 
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of servicepersons of the Ministry of People's Security to vow loyalty to leader Kim Jong Il and their dancing party took place at the ministry on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the auspicious February 16.
 At the meeting the participants solemnly vowed to uphold Kim Jong Il as the sun of the 21st century generation after generation and fulfill their honorable mission and duty as political defenders of the Workers' Party of Korea in safeguarding the country and carrying out the cause of building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.
 Then followed the dancing party.    
 Present at the events were Minister of People's Security Ju Sang Song, Director of the Political Department Ji Yong Chun and other senior officials and servicepersons of the ministry.

Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in Provinces
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in Provinces
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia exhibitions are now under way in all provinces on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday.
 Displayed at the Pyongyang City exhibition hall are at least 3,500 potted beautiful Kimjongilias presented by officials and working people at all units of the city, representing boundless reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who has performed great exploits for the country, the nation and mankind with his great Songun revolutionary leadership.    
 South Hamgyong, North Phyongan, South Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Jagang, Ryanggang and North Hamgyong provinces separately contributed thousands of potted Kimjongilias to exhibition halls, deeply impressing the visitors.
 Opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were held from Feb. 13 to 15.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the venue of the 10th Kimjongilia Festival on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 The guests were deeply moved to see immortal flowers reflecting the best wishes extended by the Korean people and progressive mankind to Kim Jong Il deeply revered and trusted by all people.    
 At the end of the visit military attaches made entries in the visitor's book.

Russian Military Band Feted
articles.content:
Russian Military Band Feted
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK National Defence Commission gave a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Feb. 15 in honor of the visiting central military band of the Defence Ministry of Russia.
 Present there on invitation were members of the central military band and staff members of the Russian embassy here.    
 On hand were general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army and officials concerned.
 Speeches were made at the reception.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Technicians
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Technicians
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il on Feb. 15 received a congratulatory letter from the members of the Chinese technical team active at the glass factory built with Chinese aid.
 The letter said that all the members of the team are pleased to join the Korean people in celebrating the auspicious February holiday, the birthday of Kim Jong Il. 
 Noting that under his wise leadership the Korean people have won one fresh victory after another in the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the letter hoped that the Korean people would build a rich and powerful country and achieve national reunification as early as possible.    
 It reiterated their pledge to more closely cooperate with the Korean comrades, work hard and make a positive contribution to the steady consolidation of the Sino-Korean friendship as instructed by Kim Jong Il and Hu Jintao.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Celebrate February Holiday
February Holiday Celebrated
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held at the units of the three services of the Korean People's Army and in every province, city and county on Feb. 15 to celebrate February 16, the auspicious holiday.
 At the meetings, the reporters said that thanks to the auspicious day in February when leader Kim Jong Il was born as the bright star over Mt. Paektu, there opened a rosy prospect of carving out the destiny of the nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the army and people of the DPRK came to be blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and there began a new history of Kim Il Sung Korea winning one victory after another under the ever-victorious banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.    
 Kim Jong Il was the first in history to make a scientific clarification of the undisputed position of the leader and his decisive role in the revolutionary movement, they noted, adding that on this basis, he has developed in depth the Juche-oriented revolutionary theories on a new higher stage and successfully carried forward and enriched President Kim Il Sung's precious Songun revolutionary exploits and tradition.
 They said that in the last more than decade, the most difficult period of the Korean revolution, Kim Jong Il provided a powerful military guarantee for accomplishing the cause of Juche, consolidated the unity of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary ranks as firm as a rock and strengthened the driving force of the Korean revolution into the strongest militant force with the KPA as its core and main force, while making endless long journeys for great Songun revolutionary leadership.
 They called upon the Party members, KPA servicepersons and people to protect Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically with their lives in any adversity and remain true to the ideology and leadership of the WPK.    
 Present at the meetings were servicepersons of the KPA three services, officials of the respective local Party and power bodies and social organizations and people from all walks of life.
